issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: client
components.description: Code for submitting and monitoring jobs

fields.description:
Comment for CLI#listEvents() contains @param jobid,  but this method doesn't has the parameter,it  may be some jira changed the method and forgot to change the comment 
So I made a simple fix.
fields.summary: Javadoc for CLI#listEvents() contains no-existent param
